name: fs-file-sync-fd
description: Backported version of fs.readFileSync, fs.writeFileSync, and fs.appendFileSync which accept file descriptor arguments for synchronously reading and writing to open file descriptors.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.postpublish: git push --follow-tags origin master && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md && echo until skywinder/github-changelog-generator#56 is fixed.
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-unit
scripts.version: github_changelog_generator -t "$npm_config_gcg_github_token" --future-release "$npm_package_version" && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install david depcheck git-branch-is travis-status
